means: 拼写错( misspell的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Her misspelling of that word eliminated her from the contest.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为她把那个单词写错了,所以不能参加比赛.

sentence.Network_en: The teacher wiped the misspelling from the blackboard.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师把黑板上拼错的字擦了.

sentence.Network_en: It would be easily identified as a misspelling of one particular word.
sentence.Network_cn: 很容易断定它是某种特殊单字的误拼.

PerfectNetExp.abs: missort 分类错误misspelling 拼写错mistake 出错
常见的有造词(coinage)和错拼(misspelling)两种。造词如:The Orangemostest Drink in the world.这是一则饮品广告,其中“orangemostes.
Latin term slip ( or slips ) of the pen , i. e. an error ( or errors ) made by an author in writinga text , such a misspelling of a name ;一个拉丁文术语，是指著者撰写正文时发生的一项或多项错误，如名称的错误拼法；
misspecification 错误设定, misspelling 拟音拼写, misspelling 形误

list.abs: change All is not available because the replacement contains the original misspelled word . choose Change to modify only this sentence , or Undo Edit to restore original sentence .无法使用“全部更改”按钮，因为用于替换的内容中含有原误拼单词。您可以选择“更改”按钮(只修改此句)或“撤消编辑”按钮(将句子还原)。
and i am a monkey with a misspelled name !, 我是个拼错名字的猴子!
Sam用字典查单字是因为他要确定他的报告(paper)里面没有任何拼错的字 (misspelled words)。 Answers 1   Right now I’m looking around the classroom.
Found % 1 misspelled words in % 2 pages ., 在 %2 个网页中发现 %1 个拼写错误的单词.

search Marketing's brand names , brand name misspellings or similar variations as keywords or key phrases for the purposes of targeting adverts on PPC search engines .搜索营销的品牌名称，品牌名称拼写错误或相似的变化作为关键词或关键短语为施行对象广告PPC搜索引擎。

entry.def: If someone misspells a word, they spell it wrongly.

example.ex: Sorry I misspelled your last name.
example.tran: 对不起，我把你的姓拼错了。

auth_sentence.content: Google, the company's name, was originally a misspelling of googol.
auth_sentence.res_content: Google, the company's name, was originally a misspelling of googol.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Google, the company's name, was originally a misspelling of googol.

auth_sentence.content: The name "Scroobius Pip" is an intentional misspelling of the Edward Lear poem, The Scroobious Pip.
auth_sentence.res_content: The name "Scroobius Pip" is an intentional misspelling of the Edward Lear poem, The Scroobious Pip.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The name "Scroobius Pip" is an intentional misspelling of the Edward Lear poem, The Scroobious Pip.

sentences.cn: 因为她把那个单词写错了,所以不能参加比赛。
